import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container, Row ,Col, Button,Spinner,Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import { PageBreadcrumb } from '../../component/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb.comp' import tickets from '../../assets/data/dummy-ticket.json' import { MessageHistory } from '../../component/MessageHistory/Message.comp' import { TicketUpdate } from '../../component/ticketUpdate/TicketUpdate.comp' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {fetchsingleTickets} from '../ticket-listing/TicketAction' // const ticket = tickets[0] export const Ticket = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const {td}=useParams(); const [message,setmessage]= useState('') const [ticket,setticket]=useState('') const{isLoading,error,selectedTicket}=useSelector(state=>state.tickets) useEffect( ()=>{ dispatch(fetchsingleTickets(td)) } ,[message,td,dispatch]) const handlOnchange =e=>{ setmessage(e.target.value) console.log(message) } const handlOnsubmit =(e)=>{ console.log(message) } return (
{/* {isLoading&& } */} {error&&{error}} {td}
subject{selectedTicket.subject }
AddededAt: {selectedTicket.openAt}
Status{selectedTicket.status }
{ticket.history&& }







) }
